title: Dan Bailey
content:
Dan Bailey was born in the United States, in a suburb of Minneapolis. He is the child of semi-nomadic parents, but has found his way back to his hometown.

Dan currently runs [Fontosaurus.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014211523/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fontosaurus.com), and is endeavouring to improve on his font design skills. He currently sells through [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014211523/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MyFonts) and is a former member of the [Chankarmy](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014211523/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Chankarmy).
author: fontosaurus
